data.title: Fix compile sdk check in 3d touch test
EditBox cursor location not update
data.body:
The size is 100, 30 and the maxlength is 300, if the width of text beyond the 100, the cursor should update the the text end, but the cursor does not move to end.

local editbox_chat = ccui.EditBox:create(cc.size(100, 30), "Images/arrowsBar.png", 0)
editbox_chat:setReturnType(cc.KEYBOARD_RETURNTYPE_DONE)
editbox_chat:setPlaceHolder("请输入聊天内容")
editbox_chat:setFontColor(cc.c3b(122, 117, 107))
editbox_chat:setMaxLength(300)
editbox_chat:setFontSize(25)
editbox_chat:setPlaceholderFontSize(25)
editbox_chat:setInputMode(cc.EDITBOX_INPUT_MODE_EMAILADDR)
editbox_chat:setAnchorPoint(cc.p(0, 0))
editbox_chat:setPosition(100, 100)
layer:addChild(editbox_chat)
![ios simulator screen shot 2015 12 22 12 05 40](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3081704/11947661/53c36544-a8a5-11e5-97ef-4882c854f6c5.png)

data.title: File Dialog
data.body: For some games, we may want to let players choose avatar from their gallery and then upload it. And as far as i know, no such functionality exists in Cocos2d-x yet. I guess it would be handy.

data.body:
I followed this tutorial:
https://blogs.windows.com/buildingapps/2015/06/15/running-cocos2d-x-on-windows-10/
but as you can expecte did not successfully ends... Here is screenshot(http://prntscr.com/9gw5c7) after about 2 - 3 minute build (I think it might download some file). And here is full report: 
http://pastebin.com/n9gdhtef
Anyone could help?

data.title: Support of press action is strongly needed in cocosstudio.
data.body:
_pressedActionEnabled field in ui::Button doesn't supported in cocosstudio editor and runtime.
This feature can be very helpful when you need to do resources as small as possible. Each button needs at least 2 images without using of press action. Using pressed action can reduce it to one.

data.title: Implement Full GC Relied memory model
data.body:
Related bindings generator PR: cocos2d/bindings-generator#217

In the old PR, I have explained my solution: #14224

Essential codes are in the first commit, 
the third one applies the solution to manual bindings, 
the fourth one is very important, it shows how and which native references are passed to script scope

Migrated from : https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/pull/14707
